com.zhuinden.simplestack.navigator

Class DefaultStateChanger.Configurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhuinden.simplestack.navigator.DefaultStateChanger.Configurer
  • Enclosing class:
    DefaultStateChanger

    public static class DefaultStateChanger.Configurer
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to configure the instance of the DefaultStateChanger. Allows setting an external state changer, which is executed before the view change. Also allows setting a DefaultStateChanger.ViewChangeCompletionListener which is executed after the view change.

    • Method Summary
